Header: Changes in Electricity Board by April
Content: Minister Ravi Karunanayake says a true change will be effected from the beginning of April on behalf of the electricity customers. He said this during an inspection tour of the Eastern Province Electricity Board Deputy General Managerâ€™s office. Minister Ravi Karunanayake said that a change will be made by April at the Electricity Board. He said when there is a request that should be looked into within 72 hours without wasting time. He further said that the Electricity Board should add strength to the economy by giving priority to the needs of the customers.
